ygData.subject: Re: 1hs vs 2hs
ygData.msgSnippet: i also use 1hs weapons. i m not sure about other s experience, but for some reason my 1hs skill seems to raise much more rapidly than my 2hs skill. also i
ygData.messageBody:
i also use 1hs weapons. i'm not sure about other's experience, but for some
reason my 1hs skill seems to raise much more rapidly than my 2hs skill. also
i prefer the speed of one hand weapons, because for some ungodly reason my
hit rate is terrible, and the more chances to hit i get the more damage i
do. the ability to bash is also useful. besides, if you have a polished
granite tomahawk, what use have you for a two hander? ;)
